The first few samples are more to try out c3js library. They have nothing to do with the directives.

  • Basic c3 sample.
  • Load c3 by angular.
  • Add some options controllable by the user.
  • Time based data and more AngularJS.

The next few samples are using the directives.

  • Basic c3 sample.
  • Add more configuration.
  • Use time based data.
  • Lots of other samples.
